description: There is a typo in cloud.py: "availaibility-zone" instead of "availability-zone".  I actually can't figure out which response this affects, but it's definitely not right!
title: Typo in cloud.py: availaibility-zone should read availability-zone

comments.content: A typo in the generator of instance metadata ends up issuing a response to DescribeInstances that has "availaibility-zone" instead of "availability-zone".
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ewanmellor

comments.content:
Code completely rewritten with
